thread.title: Stephen Colbert talks ‘terrifying prospect’ of Trump ramping up nuclear arsenal
thread.title_full: Stephen Colbert talks ‘terrifying prospect’ of Trump ramping up nuclear arsenal

author: Derek Lawrence
title: Stephen Colbert talks ‘terrifying prospect’ of Trump ramping up nuclear arsenal
text:
Email CBS 
Friday marked Stephen Colbert’s 300th episode of The Late Show and Donald Trump’s 35th day as president. To celebrate the occasion, Colbert took aim at the president’s recent assertion that he wants to make the U.S. “top of the pack” when it comes to its nuclear arsenal. 
“Not sure if he means top dog or leader of the pack, but either way, he’s not the sharpest knife on the Christmas tree,” joked Colbert. 
The host called this a “terrifying prospect,” quipping, “It’s like the Cold War all over again, but everyone’s on Russia’s side.” 
Having taped the latest show on Thursday, Colbert didn’t have a chance on Friday’s episode to address Trump’s treatment of CNN and other media outlets earlier in the day, so the comedian shared his thoughts on Twitter, urging people to not be distracted by the situation and stay focused on Russia. Don’t (RUSSIA) let this (RUSSIA) press (RUSSIA) issue distract you (RUSSIA) from (oh my God RUSSIA) Trump’s ties to Russia. (RUSSIA!) 
— Stephen Colbert (@StephenAtHome) February 25, 2017 
Watch the clip below. 
— The Late Show (@colbertlateshow) February 25, 2017 
The Late Show airs weeknights at 11:35 p.m. ET on CBS. Show Full Article
